uk.gov.gchq.palisade.data.service.reader

Class CachedSerialisedDataReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.gov.gchq.palisade.data.service.reader.SerialisedDataReader
      • uk.gov.gchq.palisade.data.service.reader.CachedSerialisedDataReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataReader
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HadoopDataReader

    public abstract class CachedSerialisedDataReader
extends SerialisedDataReader
    Adds behaviour to the SerialisedDataReader to keep details of the serialisers in the cache. This means that the serialisers are global across the Palisade deployment. When a call to read(DataReaderRequest) is made, then the map of current serialisers is loaded from the cache and merged into the existing map. Therefore, if a serialiser is added, then the DataReader will find it dynamically and does not need to be restarted.

    • Method Detail

      • retrieveSerialisersFromCache

        public void retrieveSerialisersFromCache()
        Load the map of serialisers from the cache service. The map retrieved will be merged into the current list by calling SerialisedDataReader.addAllSerialisers(Map).

      • read

        public DataReaderResponse read(DataReaderRequest request)
        This read method uses the serialiser that matches the data type of the resource to serialise the raw data and apply the rules to the data and then deserialise it back to the raw format expected by the client. Overridden to update the list of serialisers before attempting the read.
        Specified by:
        read in interface DataReader
        Overrides:
        read in class SerialisedDataReader
        Parameters:
        request - DataReaderRequest containing the resource to be read, rules to be applied, the user requesting the data and the purpose for accessing the data.
        Returns:
        a DataReaderResponse containing the stream of data read to be streamed back to the client

      • addSerialiserToCache

        public static java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.Boolean> addSerialiserToCache(CacheService cache,
                                                                                             DataFlavour flavour,
                                                                                             Serialiser<?> serialiser)
        Adds a new serialiser to the cache of serialisers. This method will associate the given DataFlavour with the given Serialiser in the cache. The next time a CachedSerialisedDataReader subclass attempts to read some data, it will see this new mapping. This method is not atomic, but retrieves the entire map, adds the new mapping and then replaces it in the cache.
        Parameters:
        cache - the cache service to use
        flavour - the data flavour to apply
        serialiser - the serialiser
        Returns:
        a boolean that will complete when the map is updated in the cache
